lead_paragraph: Barcelona midfielder Ivan Rakitic embraced the art of winning ugly after they beat 10-man Real Betis 2-0 to move closer to retaining their La Liga title.

headline.print_headline: I Don't Care if We Shine as Long as We Win, Says Rakitic
headline.main: I Don't Care if We Shine as Long as We Win, Says Rakitic

snippet: Barcelona midfielder Ivan Rakitic embraced the art of winning ugly after they beat 10-man Real Betis 2-0 to move closer to retaining their La Liga title....
